meanings.definition: A plan or suggestion put forward for consideration or discussion.
meanings.sent1: Her proposal to have a picnic in the park was well-received by her friends.
meanings.sent2: The company's proposal for a new marketing strategy was approved by the board.
meanings.sent3: The proposal to have a pizza party at the library raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: His proposal to paint the town red with excitement was met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The proposal to build a treehouse in the backyard sparked excitement among the children.

meanings.sent1: He nervously got down on one knee and made his proposal to her.
meanings.sent2: She was overjoyed when she received a romantic proposal from her partner.
meanings.sent3: The proposal during the family reunion caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her heart skipped a beat when she received the unexpected proposal.
meanings.sent5: The sunset provided a beautiful backdrop for his heartfelt proposal.
